item.itunes:author: Alex Cook

item.title: Episode 17 : Dealing with Ethical Issues in Business
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) - Episode 17

An interview with David Smith, Director, Genesis Charitable Foundation.

How do you respond to ethical issues in business? David says, "As Christians, there should never be a question regarding black or white issues." The Bible clearly admonishes us to make a stand, even on the smallest things. In confusing situations, David says the company of wise counsel is a lifesaver.

item.title: Episode 16 : Building a Business that has a Kingdom Impact
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 16
An interview with Wez Hone, Founder, Business Greenhouse

A Christian businessmen is specially gifted by the Lord to multiply and increase the profitability of a business. He is likewise tasked to steer it towards making a Kingdom impact too. Wez Hone says “if one would like to make a Kingdom impact, they need to spend a considerable amount of time with the King. Radical intimacy with God is REQUIRED to have a massive impact in this world.

item.title: Episode 15 : The Defining Mark of a Christian Businessperson
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 15
An interview with David Smith, Director, Genesis Charitable Foundation.

Business around the world are striving to be self-reliant. They want to do their best, to overcome their limitations, to survive. Christian businesses, however, recognizes these limitations and therefore are dependent to God. Their survival depends on their reliance with God. Every detail is trusted into God’s care.

item.title: Episode 14 : Opportunities in a Globalised World
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 14
with Wez Hone, Founder, Business Greenhouse

Nowadays you can start a business with just a mobile phone, a Facebook or Twitter account, and a good number of contacts. It is quite easy to begin a business with these simple tools. With just a few clicks, you could literally sell something to someone… online (and get really, really rich!). The opportunities are waiting for you.

item.title: Episode 13 : Doing Business Supernaturally
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 13
with David Smith, Director, Genesis Charitable Foundation

Let Him! It’s the key to doing business supernaturally. Let God take you and your lot to the His level. It’s the ONLY way to build a striking, lasting and successful business. Businessmen think they can take their businesses to the next level. But no. They try do what they can, for as long as they can, for as much as they can… but it just really won’t take off without God in control.

item.title: Episode 12 : Spiritual Warfare in Business
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 12
with Wez Hone, Founder, Business Greenhouse

It’s high on the enemy’s agenda to break our businesses. The enemy knows how to take this down, and the destructive results (in our lives) when he keeps it down. We need to battle in faith and in prayer. We need to uphold our businesses against the enemy’s work. Take dominion over (full authority) over our businesses.

item.title: Episode 11 : Great Advice for New Entrepreneurs
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 11
with David Smith, Director, Genesis Charitable Foundation.

Commit everything to the Lord. Everything. When you receive your first salary, make the firm decision to give it to God, every dollar. Remind yourself that in doing this, our loving Father will not leave you, He will provide every dollar you would ever need.

Get your security from God. Always.

item.title: Episode 10 : Integrating Faith into Work
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 10 with Wez Hone, Founder, Business Greenhouse

A lot of businessmen believe that they will lose credibility if they profess their faith (what they believe in) to clients, partners or co-workers. The opposite, really, happens. People tend to acknowledge the integrity of who you are more than the deceit of being somebody else.

item.title: Episode 6 : How do you Multiply your business?
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 6 An interview with Wez Hone, Founder, Business Greenhouse

Pour hard work into your business, work the long hours, play your strengths… key elements to multiplying your business. Supernaturally favored business, on the other hand, far exceeds even multiplied business. It is the Lord’s hand that causes this… and we call it business miracles!

item.title: Episode 5 : Dealing with Tough Ethical Issues in Business
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 5 with Wez Hone, Founder, Business Greenhouse

The Bible is very clear that one should conduct his life with integrity. Every business transaction has to be fair to all party conducting it. We have to find the balance of looking to mutually win. It is tough, but the Lord will allow it. Exodus tells us about the gleaning principle so that everyone gets enough for their need.

item.title: Episode 4 : Keys to creating a Successful Kingdom Business
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 5 An interview with David Smith, Director, Genesis Charitable Foundation

If you aim to sincerely help people, to address their need with a timely solution, you will build a successful Kingdom Business. People will naturally gravitate toward you, seeking your role to play in their lives. God knows how best to run your business. Let Him do it.

item.title: Episode 3 : How to Hire & Fire Staff in a Christian Business
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 3 An interview with David Smith, Director, Genesis Charitable Foundation

The Christian businessman will be loving to the individual and loving to the corporate. You need to think for these 2 entities. There should be a clear balance that both the individual and the corporate should benefit from the new relationship. Get a consultant to help your decision. In the end, you are the gatekeeper. Stay in focus.

item.title: Episode 2 : The Defining Mark of a Christian Businessperson
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 2 with Wez Hone, Founder, Business Greenhouse

He would be marked by the change in culture that happens around him. He brings another way to do things, a counter-culture person. He is an influencer and people would trust him to lead them to the right way.

It is naturally a tough job to do, but the Christian businessman would do it. He has the DNA… God’s DNA.

item.title: Episode 1 : Can you do business supernaturally?
item.description:
Christian Wealth TV (CWTV) – Episode 1 with Wez Hone, Founder, Business Greenhouse

Yes, but you cannot do it alone. You are the natural, God is the Super! You cannot do business supernaturally without God. It’s impossible!
